Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but too far from the city centre & metro”
Reviews.Author: Ellane
Reviews.Content: firstly guy reception nice helpful throughout 5 day stay arrived middle august parents teenage daughter nice clean bright clean bathroom bit stingy toilet tissue comfortable realise importance swimming pool restaurant hotel grounds middle august blazing hot nice swimming pool relax evening restuarant cause didnt particularly east pizza pasta everyday stay am aware italian stable food london am variety foods supermarkets hand location hotel wasnt apart mc ds near metro station kebab shop near metro station roughly 15 min walk sun temps 30c shade wasnt easiest metro station cornelia traveling centre rome easy buses stuck ease convenience parents getting bit recomment hotel ideal located hotel dont mind staying hussle bussle maybe near attractions enjoy night life nearer centre rome unfortunatley recomend hotel nice thats honest opinion
